Message.Title: The Perks of Being Pres
Message.Msg: Obama has signed into law a bill granting lifetime Secret Service protection for former Presidents and their wives. Now that's what I call spending cuts. Why not VPs and Congressmen/women? Heaven knows there are a few who should go into hiding when their terms are up.
